input.sentences: i spent all day out on the farm .
i could see the house in the distance .
there was a lot of land out here .
when i got back to the house i was very hungry .
output.sentences: We took a scenic route & spent the day in farm country.
For miles & miles, there was nothing but farmland.
Well, every now and then we'd see a house or barn in the distance.
We discussed how nice it would be to buy some land out here.
By the time we got home we were both quite tired and hungry.
